events.message: I recently received my order but the product is not what I expected, and I would like to request a refund.
The request was reviewed and the issue was classified as a refund inquiry related to product dissatisfaction.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer's order.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund, and I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you'd like to receive a refund? This will help us process your request quickly.
My order number is 987654321, and I want a refund because the item does not match the description on your website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a return label to ship the item back at no cost.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and help with the refund process.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should receive confirmation via email shortly. Please use the provided label to return the product.
We are following up to ensure you received the refund and the return label and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund process has been completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case now.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer’s email to gather feedback about their support experience.
